desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

p.p: Application name. Must be a valid entry on the PGM.FILE file. Can be input with abbreviation, which is defined in ABBREVIATION application in T24

desc.p: A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.

p.p: Business group ID from BUSINESS.GROUP used for the purpose of grouping.

desc.p: A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the BUSINESS.GROUP file.

p.p: End (minimum) category number for the application defined in Field 1 (APPLICATION). Category Code entered should be within the range of the above application.

desc.p: A maximum of 5 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CATEGORY file.

p.p: Start (maximum) category number for the application defined in Field 1 (APPLICATION). Category Code entered should be within the range of the above application.

desc.p: A maximum of 5 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CATEGORY file.
